Title: Hello
Writer: Usha Damerla (dialogue), Vikram K. Kumar, Mukund Pandey (script coordination), Kittu Vissapragada (dialogue)
Actors: Akhil Akkineni, Kalyani Priyadarshan, Jagapathi Babu, Ramya Krishnan
Plot: Avinash (Akhil Akkineni) in his childhood meets a girl (Kalyani Priyadarshan as Junnu) and believes that she is his soulmate, and patiently waits to come across her even after growing into an adult. Will they meet again?
